channel.title: Need help with this problem. please look
channel.description:
Well im making my first server and I think I have done everything right but I was wondering if it is necessary if I need to do this step(s).
Now open My Computer, head to C:/Program Files/Java and find the 'jre' folder. Copy the folder name and replace 'YOURJAVAVERSION' with the folder name. ---- I found the java file but ther are multiple jre folders. Also where am I supposed to paste them?
Click Save As and save it as a batch file. To save it as a batch file you can either make it end with .bat or clicking 'All files' at filetype, and adding '.bat' at the end.
Also for the part with the variables in chapter 6.. I went to name it classpath but it was already JDKfolder there. Because on the guide it just tells you what to do with JDK 6 update 1 & 2.
I think that is it but once someone answers me and I do what they say I will post other questions if it continues not to work. Thank you for your time and help. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2008, 08:40:25 pm[/size][hr]Please someone help so i can run this server...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2008, 09:11:25 pm[/size][hr]Please someone helpp...

item.title: Need help with this problem. please look
item.dc:creator: @Jrmysams1993 Jrmysams1993
item.description:
@Jrmysams1993 wrote:

Well im making my first server and I think I have done everything right but I was wondering if it is necessary if I need to do this step(s).

Now open My Computer, head to C:/Program Files/Java and find the ‘jre’ folder. Copy the folder name and replace ‘YOURJAVAVERSION’ with the folder name. ---- I found the java file but ther are multiple jre folders. Also where am I supposed to paste them?

Click Save As and save it as a batch file.
To save it as a batch file you can either make it end with .bat or clicking ‘All files’ at filetype, and adding ‘.bat’ at the end.

Also for the part with the variables in chapter 6…
I went to name it classpath but it was already JDKfolder there. Because on the guide it just tells you what to do with JDK 6 update 1 & 2.

I think that is it but once someone answers me and I do what they say I will post other questions if it continues not to work. Thank you for your time and help. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2008, 08:40:25 pm[/size][hr]Please someone help so i can run this server…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2008, 09:11:25 pm[/size][hr]Please someone helpp…
